price: No hay lugar en la Tierra al que puedan escapar de Dios. No tienen protector ni socorredor fuera de Dios.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
